mapper.insert:
insert into transfers_goods (goods_id, origin_goods_id, inventory_id, transfer_num, remark, transfer_id, wh_loc_id, wh_loc_code, goods_batch, is_material, goods_name, goods_code, goods_barcode, goods_spec, goods_unit ) values
(#{item.goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.originGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.inventoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.transferNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transferId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.whLocId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.whLocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isMaterial,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update.foreach: update transfers_goods set origin_goods_id = #{item.originGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, inventory_id = #{item.inventoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, transfer_num = #{item.transferNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_id = #{item.transferId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, wh_loc_id = #{item.whLocId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, wh_loc_code = #{item.whLocCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_batch = #{item.goodsBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_material = #{item.isMaterial,jdbcType=TINYINT}, goods_name = #{item.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_code = #{item.goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_barcode = #{item.goodsBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_spec = #{item.goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_unit = #{item.goodsUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{item.goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
select
from transfers_goods where transfer_id = #{transferId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
and (goods_name = #{materialProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or goods_code = #{materialProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or goods_barcode = #{materialProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_material = 0
and (goods_name = #{finishedProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or goods_code = #{finishedProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or goods_barcode = #{finishedProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_material = 1

select
from transfers_goods where transfer_id = #{transferId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
